You got a configuration error: The verification URL %s contains a question mark. Facebook can't handle this. Use realurl or cooluri to get rid of that nagging character (default configuration for realurl included in ext_localconf.php within the dix_easylogin extension), or remove some variables from the TypoScript option "preserveGETvars".
